Hati-hati! 5 Jenis Sayuran Ini Pernah Membunuh Manusia
02 Nov 2019, 04:00 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood



Jakarta - Sayuran merupakan makanan yang sehat dan kaya nutrisi. Namun jika tidak hati-hati saat mengolah, dan memakannya, sayuran ini bisa membunuh manusia.Sayuran kaya akan nutrisi, rendah kalori, hingga dapat membantu asupan vitamin harian. Sayuran juga sering dijadikan sebagai makanan dalam pola hidup sehat, mulai disulap menjadi salad, sayuran tumis, hingga dimakan saat masih segar.Akan tetapi tidak semua sayuran, sebaik kelihatannya. Bahkan ada beberapa kasus kematian, yang melibatkan beberapa jenis sayuran sebagai penyebabnya. Mulai dari menyantap timun, bayam, hingga selada.Dilansir dari berbagai sumber, berikut lima sayuran yang pernah membunuh manusia.Baca Juga: Ternyata 5 Makanan yang Sering Dikonsumsi Ini Bisa Mengandung Racun(sob/odi)


Foto: Istimewa

Pada tahun 2007 lalu, pasangan suami istri dari Oklahoma, Amerika, melakukan perjalanan rutin mereka untuk mengambil aneka sayuran dari perusahaan Dole, yang ada di Yuma, Arizona. Saat itu sang istri, bernama Sheila Kay Ross, keluar sebentar dari mobil untuk mengurus beberapa surat.Tapi Ross tak pernah kembali, hingga sang suami menghubungi kepolisian Yuma. Meski sudah dicari kemana-mana, tapi Ross tidak bisa ditemukan. Tiga hari kemudian jasadnya ditemukan di dalam truk, yang tengah mengantar sayuran selada ke Iowa. Ternyata truk ini berada di dalam lokasi yang sama, ketika Ross hilang.Setelah ditelusuri lebih lanjut, Ross meninggal setelah ia tergencet sayuran selada dalam jumlah besar di dalam truk itu, hingga kesulitan bernapas dan meninggal dunia. Namun tidak diketahui alasan mengapa Ross bisa berada di dalam truk itu, pihak polisi pun menyebutkan bahwa kematiannya disebabkan oleh tertimbun selada.

(sob/odi)



Foto: Istimewa

Virus Salmonella, biasanya dikaitkan dengan konsumsi daging atau telur mentah. Tapi ternyata virus ini juga bisa kontaminasi sayuran seperti timun. Di tahun 2015, virus Salmonella ini berada di dalam ratusan mentimun.Di mana mentimun ini menyebabkan 907 orang di berbagai wilayah di Amerika terpapar virus ini, dan lebih dari 200 orang harus dirawat ke rumah sakit. Serta menjadi penyebab meninggalnya empat orang.Timun ini ternyata berasal dari Baja, Meksiko, dan dikonfirmasi sebagai penyebaran virus Salmonella. Biasanya orang-orang yang mengalami gejala Salmonella, hanya bisa bertahan 4-7 hari tanpa perawatan, sebelum menghembuskan napas terakhir mereka.

(sob/odi)



Foto: Istimewa

Kaya nutrisi dan mudah ditemukan, bayam masuk ke dalam salah satu sayuran paling populer di dunia. Bayam disebut sebagai pelopor superfood, atau makanan sehat yang memiliki banyak manfaat kesehatan untuk tubuh.Tapi di tahun 2006, banyak kasus kematian yang melibatkan bayam sebagai penyebabnya. Saat itu virus E.coli tengah menyebar, dan dapat memicu lebih dari 200 penyakit, yang mengakibatkan banyak orang harus dirawat di rumah sakit.Lebih dari 31 orang dirawat karena gagal ginjal, dan tiga di antaranya harus meninggal karena terserang virus ini. Di antara para korban yang meninggal kebanyakan dari mereka sebelumnya, menyantap bayam mentah, yang dikabarkan sebagai penyebab munculnya virus E.coli tersebut.

(sob/odi)



Foto: Istimewa

Punya rasa yang enak dan kaya nutrisi, kentang bisa menjadi penyebab kematian beberapa orang. Di tahun 2013, kentang yang mulai membusuk menjadi penyebab dari meninggalnya satu keluarga yang ada di Rusia.Kejadiannya saat itu, pria berusia 42 tahun asal Rusia tersebut masuk ke dalam basement yang ada di rumahnya. Namun ia tak pernah keluar dari sana, karena penasaran, sang istri pun pergi ke basement dan keduanya pingsan karena mencium aroma beracun dari dalam kentang yang mulai membusuk.Karena hal ini, sang nenek, dan putra mereka juga ikut ke basement untuk melihat kondisi mereka. Namun, nyawa mereka semua tak tertolong. Ketika bantuan datang, semua anggota keluarga itu sudah meninggal, kecuali anak perempuan mereka yang berusia 8 tahun.

(sob/odi)



Foto: Istimewa

Frozen vegetable, atau sayuran beku sering ditemukan di banyak supermarket dan toko makanan. Selain lebih praktis, sayuran beku ini bisa tahan lama, dan bisa digunakan kapan saja. Tapi paket sayuran beku ini ternyata bisa menghilangkan nyawa manusia.Pada tahun 2013, ada virus Listeria yang menyebar di wilayah Amerika. Setelah diteliti, ternyata virus Listeria ini berasal dari beberapa produk sayuran beku yang dijual di super market. Sayuran beku ini berupa kacang-kacangan beku, brokoli, hingga kacang polong.Karena virus Listeria ini, ada tiga korban yang meninggal di dunia. Meski kematian mereka bukan disebabkan oleh infeksi bakteri, tapi banyak orang yang percaya bahwa kematian mereka karena mengonsumsi sayuran beku.Baca Juga: 7 Penyebab Buah dan Sayur Segar dari Supermarket Bisa Bikin Sakit

Be Careful! 5 Types of Vegetables Have Killed Humans
02 Nov 2019, 04:00 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood



Jakarta - Vegetables are healthy foods and rich in nutrients. But if not careful when processing, and eating it, these vegetables can kill humans. Vegetables are rich in nutrients, low in calories, so they can help daily vitamin intake. Vegetables are also often used as food in a healthy lifestyle, starting to be transformed into salads, stir-fried vegetables, until eaten while still fresh. But not all vegetables are as good as they look. There are even cases of death, which involve several types of vegetables as the cause. Starting from eating cucumber, spinach, to lettuce. Reported from various sources, here are five vegetables that have killed humans. Also Read: It turns out that 5 often consumed foods can contain toxins (sob / odi)


Photo: Special

In 2007, a married couple from Oklahoma, United States, made a routine trip to pick up vegetables from the Dole company, which is in Yuma, Arizona. At that time his wife, named Sheila Kay Ross, stepped out of the car to take care of a few letters. But Ross never returned, so the husband contacted the Yuma police. Despite being searched everywhere, but Ross could not be found. Three days later his body was found in a truck, which was delivering lettuce vegetables to Iowa. It turned out that this truck was in the same location, when Ross was lost. After further tracing, Ross died after he squashed large amounts of lettuce in the truck, until difficulty breathing and died. But it is not known the reason why Ross could be in the truck, the police also said that his death was caused by lettuce buried.

Photo: Special

Salmonella virus, usually associated with consumption of raw meat or eggs. But it turns out this virus can also contaminate vegetables such as cucumber. In 2015, the Salmonella virus was in hundreds of cucumbers. Where this cucumber caused 907 people in various regions of America to be exposed to this virus, and more than 200 people had to be hospitalized. As well as being the cause of death of four people. This cucumber turned out to be from Baja, Mexico, and confirmed as the spread of the Salmonella virus. Usually people who experience Salmonella symptoms, can only survive 4-7 days without treatment, before their last breath.

(friend / odi)



Photo: Special

Rich in nutrition and easy to find, spinach is one of the most popular vegetables in the world. Spinach is called a pioneer of super food, or healthy food that has many health benefits for the body. But in 2006, many cases of death involving spinach as the cause. At that time the E.coli virus was spreading, and could trigger more than 200 diseases, which resulted in many people having to be hospitalized. More than 31 people were treated for kidney failure, and three of them had to die from this virus. Among the victims who died most of them before, eating raw spinach, which is rumored to be the cause of the emergence of the E. coli virus.

(friend / odi)



Photo: Special

Having a good taste and rich in nutrition, potatoes can be the cause of death of some people. In 2013, potatoes that began to rot became the cause of the death of a family in Russia. It happened at that time, a 42-year-old man from Russia entered into the basement in his house. But he never came out of there, out of curiosity, his wife went to the basement and both of them fainted because they smelled the poisonous aroma from the potatoes that began to rot. Because of this, the grandmother and their son also went to the basement to see their condition. However, their lives were all beyond help. When help arrived, all the family members had died, except their 8-year-old daughter.

Photo: Special

Frozen vegetables, or frozen vegetables are often found in many supermarkets and food stores. Besides being more practical, these frozen vegetables can last a long time, and can be used at any time. But this frozen vegetable package could actually eliminate human lives. In 2013, there was a Listeria virus that spread in the Americas. After researching, it turns out that the Listeria virus comes from several frozen vegetable products sold at the super market. This frozen vegetables in the form of frozen beans, broccoli, until the peas. Because of this Listeria virus, there are three victims who died in the world. Although their deaths are not caused by bacterial infections, many people believe that their deaths are from eating frozen vegetables.
